|brand = RPF |model = Raspberry Pi Zero |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 2 W |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ABCB-RPIZ2 |icid = 20953-RPIZ2 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM2710A1; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-53 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1chipmodelfull = <!-- RAM1 full chip info --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = E4:5F:01
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;5.10.92-v8+;Raspberry Pi OS (Debian 11.2);
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.2 (BLE), Micro SD Card slot, Mini HDMI output, CSI, GPIO |addchip = Dual PWM Step Down DC-DC Converter;Diodes Inc.;PAM2306;;1;,,, 2.7MHz 3A Step-Down Converter w/ I2C Interface;Richtek;RT8088A;;1;,,, 500mA 5.5V LDO Linear Regulator;Richtek;RT9081A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = pi |defaultpass = raspberry |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = RetroPie, LibreELEC, Ubuntu Core, TLXOS
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/28/2021 |estreldate = 10/2021 |estprice = 15 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B09LH5SBPS |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = UK
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;; |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Raspberry Pi Zero 2 Â© Raspberry Pi 2021'' is silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|RPF Raspberry Pi series}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Broadcom]]'' BCM2710A1 @1.0GHz :Quad-Core ARM Cortex-53 *GPU: VideoCore IV, 3D-core *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR2L = in SIP package w/ CPU *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *WiFi: Broadcom 1T1R 802.11n, BT 4.2 BLE *USB: 1x micro USB 2.0 *GPIO: 1x 40-pin port *Power Source: 5V/2.5A via micro USB
==Links of Interest== {{WPLink|Raspberry_Pi}} *[https://linuxgizmos.com/raspberry-pi-zero-w-takes-a-sip-of-cortex-a53/ ''Raspberry Pi Zero W takes a SiP of Cortex-A53'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/10/28/raspberry-pi-zero-2-w-launched-with-quad-core-cpu-512mb-ram/ ''$15 Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W launched'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2021/10/raspberry-pi-zero-2-w-crams-pi-3-parts-into-the-same-tiny-board/ ''Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W'' on '''arsTechnica''']
